summary: Provides object‑oriented management of Web Map Service (WMS) layers within a PyQt UI, offering a persistent, popup‑based interface that lets users add, remove, filter, reorder, and synchronize multiple map layers while handling click interactions without reloading on each UI change.
business_intent: Enable efficient, user‑friendly handling of multiple WMS map layers in the MSS application, improving performance and usability by keeping layers persistent and offering comprehensive layer control through a unified dialog.
